LanguageData.MustPlaceOnGravel: Must place on soil with min 70% fertility
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnRegularSoil: Must place on soil with min 100% fertility
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnGoodSoil: Must place on soil with min 120% fertility
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnFertileSoil: Must place on soil with min 140% fertility
